languages.text: "Вот оно". {n}Мрачный голос Кибеллы заполняет эфир.{/n} "После сирены к утренней вахте я сделала расклад {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}. Но видения, ниспосланные Неумирающим, были слишком расплывчатыми. Я видела реки крови, стекающиеся к мертвым костям. И размытую фигуру. Смеющуюся. Ступающую по праху усопших. Теперь понятно: Неумирающий желает, чтобы я отправилась по следам той фигуры. Я выхожу на охоту".

traits.locale_text: "Вот оно". {n}Мрачный голос Кибеллы заполняет эфир.{/n} "После сирены к утренней вахте я сделала расклад {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}. Но видения, ниспосланные Неумирающим, были слишком расплывчатыми. Я видела реки крови, стекающиеся к мертвым костям. И размытую фигуру. Смеющуюся. Ступающую по праху усопших. Теперь понятно: Неумирающий желает, чтобы я отправилась по следам той фигуры. Я выхожу на охоту".

languages.text: "And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."
languages.original_text: "Вот оно". {n}Мрачный голос Кибеллы заполняет эфир.{/n} "После сирены к утренней вахте я сделала расклад {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}. Но видения, ниспосланные Неумирающим, были слишком расплывчатыми. Я видела реки крови, стекающиеся к мертвым костям. И размытую фигуру. Смеющуюся. Ступающую по праху усопших. Теперь понятно: Неумирающий желает, чтобы я отправилась по следам той фигуры. Я выхожу на охоту".

traits.locale_text: "And so it comes," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of His Tarot after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too unclear. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear, the Undying One wants me to stalk where this figure had passed. I am declaring the hunt."

"And so it comes," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of His Tarot after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too unclear. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear, the Undying One wants me to stalk where this figure had passed. I am declaring the hunt."

"And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of His Tarot after the morning-watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too murky. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. I am going hunting."

"And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of His Tarot after the morning-watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too murky. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. I am going hunting."

"And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."

"And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."

languages.text: "Und so begab es sich", {n}erfüllt Kibellahs dunkle Stimme die Übertragung,{/n} "dass ich nach der Sirene zur Morgenwache {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein Tarot{/g} deutete, aber die Visionen des Todlosen waren nicht klar genug. Ich sah Ströme von Blut auf die Knochen der Toten zufließen, und eine verschwommene Gestalt lachte und trat auf die Asche der Gefallenen. Jetzt ist alles klar: Der Todlose will, dass ich die Spuren der Gestalt verfolge. Und damit beginnt meine Jagd."
languages.original_text: "And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."

traits.locale_text: "Und so begab es sich", {n}erfüllt Kibellahs dunkle Stimme die Übertragung,{/n} "dass ich nach der Sirene zur Morgenwache sein Tarot deutete, aber die Visionen des Todlosen waren nicht klar genug. Ich sah Ströme von Blut auf die Knochen der Toten zufließen, und eine verschwommene Gestalt lachte und trat auf die Asche der Gefallenen. Jetzt ist alles klar: Der Todlose will, dass ich die Spuren der Gestalt verfolge. Und damit beginnt meine Jagd."

languages.text: «Finalmente ha sucedido», {n}dice la sombría voz de Kibellah por los vocotransmisores.{/n} «Llevé a cabo una lectura de {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g} tras la sirena del turno de maitines, pero las visiones que me envió el Inmortal eran demasiado vagas. Vi ríos de sangre que fluían hacia los huesos de los muertos, y una figura borrosa que se reía mientras pisaba las cenizas de los caídos. Ahora lo veo con claridad: el Inmortal desea que siga las huellas de esa figura. Ha comenzado mi cacería».
languages.original_text: "And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."

traits.locale_text: «Finalmente ha sucedido», {n}dice la sombría voz de Kibellah por los vocotransmisores.{/n} «Llevé a cabo una lectura de Su tarot tras la sirena del turno de maitines, pero las visiones que me envió el Inmortal eran demasiado vagas. Vi ríos de sangre que fluían hacia los huesos de los muertos, y una figura borrosa que se reía mientras pisaba las cenizas de los caídos. Ahora lo veo con claridad: el Inmortal desea que siga las huellas de esa figura. Ha comenzado mi cacería».

languages.text: 「そして、通り過ぎる…」{n}キベラの沈痛な声が流れてくる。{/n}「朝の当直のサイレンが鳴った後に{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}タロット{/g}で占ったが、不死の者から伝わるビジョンはとてもボンヤリしていた。血の川が流れて、死体の骨に向かい、ぼんやりとした人影が笑いながら倒れた人の灰の上を歩くのが見えた。これではっきりした。不死の者は我に、その人影の足跡をたどれと言っている。狩りの始まりだ」
languages.original_text: "And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、通り過ぎる…」{n}キベラの沈痛な声が流れてくる。{/n}「朝の当直のサイレンが鳴った後にタロットで占ったけれど、不死の者から伝わるビジョンはとてもボンヤリしていたの。血の川が流れて、死体の骨に向かい、ぼんやりとした人影が笑いながら倒れた人の灰の上を歩くのが見えたわ。これではっきりした。不死の者は私に、その人影の足跡をたどれと言っているわ。私の狩りの始まりね」

languages.text: “原来这就是事情的原委。”{n}绮贝菈忧郁的声音笼罩在音阵频道之中。{/n}“我在晨哨鸣笛后用{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}进行了占卜，但不死之神预言的景象实在是太模糊了。我看到血流成河，看到深红色的潮水涌向逝者的亡骸，还看到了某个模糊的身影，哈哈大笑，践踏在死者的骨灰上。如今，这一切已经很清楚，不死之神希望我追踪他的足迹。既然如此，那么狩猎便开始了。”
languages.original_text: "And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."

traits.locale_text: “原来这就是事情的原委。”{n}绮贝菈忧郁的声音笼罩在音阵频道之中。{/n}“我在晨哨鸣笛后用祂的圣牌进行了占卜，但不死之神预言的景象实在是太模糊了。我看到血流成河，看到深红色的潮水涌向逝者的亡骸，还看到了某个模糊的身影，哈哈大笑，践踏在死者的骨灰上。如今，这一切已经很清楚，不死之神希望我追踪他的足迹。既然如此，那么狩猎便开始了。”

languages.text: « Ce qui devait arriver est arrivé. {n}La voix lugubre de Kibellah résonne sur les ondes.{/n} J'ai tiré les cartes de {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot{/g} juste après la sirène du quart matinal, mais les visions envoyées par l'Immortel étaient indistinctes. J'ai vu des rivières de sang ruisseler vers les ossements des morts, et une silhouette floue riant aux éclats en foulant sous ses pieds les cendres des défunts. Tout s'éclaire, à présent : l'Immortel veut que je remonte la piste de ladite silhouette. Ainsi commence ma traque. »
languages.original_text: "And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui devait arriver est arrivé. {n}La voix lugubre de Kibellah résonne sur les ondes.{/n} J'ai tiré les cartes de Son tarot juste après la sirène du quart matinal, mais les visions envoyées par l'Immortel étaient indistinctes. J'ai vu des rivières de sang ruisseler vers les ossements des morts, et une silhouette floue riant aux éclats en foulant sous ses pieds les cendres des défunts. Tout s'éclaire, à présent : l'Immortel veut que je remonte la piste de ladite silhouette. Ainsi commence ma traque. »

languages.text: "İşte böyle vuku buluyor." {n}Kibellah'nın kasvetli sesi, tüm yayında yankılanıyor.{/n} "Gündüz vardiyası sireninin ardından {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}O'nun Tarotu{/g}'nda okuma yaptım. Fakat Ölmeyen'in bahşettiği görüler pek müphemdi. Ölülerin kemiklerine doğru akıp giden kan nehirleri gördüm. Bir de bulanık bir silüet vardı, kahkaha atarak ölülerin küllerini ayaklarıyla çiğniyordu. Artık her şey ortada. Ölmeyen, silüetin izini takip etmemi arzuluyor. Böylelikle avım başlıyor."
languages.original_text: "And so it comes to pass," {n}Kibellah's sombre voice fills the broadcast.{/n} "I performed a reading of {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} after the morning watch siren, but the visions sent by the Undying One were too indistinct. I saw rivers of blood flowing toward the bones of the dead, and a blurred figure, laughing, treading upon the ashes of the fallen. It is now clear: the Undying One desires me to follow the figure's tracks. Thus, my hunt begins."
